document.full_text: the united auto workers, as part of an effort to broaden support among middle class americans as it approaches bargaining with the three major u.s. automakers, on thursday rallied at a downtown detroit branch of the bank of america
document.title: uaw protests bank in attempt to gain wider support
lines_and_colors: the united auto workers, as part of an effort to broaden support among middle class americans as it approaches bargaining with the three major u.s. automakers, on thursday rallied at a downtown detroit branch of the bank of america
